movie.title: Trolls World Tour
movie.overview: Queen Poppy and Branch make a surprising discovery there are other Troll worlds beyond their own, and their distinct differences create big clashes between these various tribes. When a mysterious threat puts all of the Trolls across the land in danger, Poppy, Branch, and their band of friends must embark on an epic quest to create harmony among the feuding Trolls to unite them against certain doom.

movie.title: Wasp Network
movie.overview: Havana, Cuba, 1990. Rene Gonzalez, an airplane pilot, unexpectedly flees the country, leaving behind his wife Olga and his daughter Irma, and begins a new life in Miami, where he becomes a member of an anti Castro organization.

movie.title: The Way Back
movie.overview: A former basketball all-star, who has lost his wife and family foundation in a struggle with addiction attempts to regain his soul and salvation by becoming the coach of a disparate ethnically mixed high school basketball team at his alma mater.

movie.title: No Time to Die
movie.overview: Bond has left active service and is enjoying a tranquil life in Jamaica. His peace is short-lived when his old friend Felix Leiter from the CIA turns up asking for help. The mission to rescue a kidnapped scientist turns out to be far more treacherous than expected, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

movie.title: Babyteeth
movie.overview: A terminally ill teen upsets her parents when she falls in love with a small-time drug dealer.

movie.title: Pari
movie.overview: Babak, an Iranian student in Greece, doesn't show up to welcome his visiting parents at the Athens airport. Pari and her older husband, both devout Muslims abroad for the first time, are ill-prepared to search for their son in an intimidating and alien environment. All their attempts to find a clue that might lead them to him prove to be in vain and they soon reach a dead end. But Pari can't give up looking for him,even when returning to Iran seems like her only choice.

movie.title: 7 Years in Germany
movie.overview: Garyfalia and Yannis emigrated in 1970 from their village in Drama (Northern Greece) to Germany, in search of a better life. They lived in Esslingen am Neckar and in Metzingen until 1977. What did they win? What did they lose? How long can someone carry the burden of his decisions? What is the price of time gone by? A confession.
